events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund as the size does not fit me at all.
The system has labelled this customer inquiry as related to a refund request due to size issues.
Support agent assigned to handle refund requests for apparel size issues.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I’m here to help you with the refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for wanting a refund so I can proceed?
Sure, my order number is 4582930. I want a refund because the jacket's size is much smaller than described on the website.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate a full refund once the jacket is returned. I’ll send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the help and look forward to receiving the shipping label.
The return shipping label has been sent to your email. Please send back the jacket at your earliest convenience for the refund to be processed.
Just checking in to see if you have sent the jacket back and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Hi, yes, I sent the jacket back yesterday via the provided label. Please confirm when you receive it.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect in your account within 5 business days.
Thank you for contacting us. We have closed your case now that the refund has been processed successfully.
We have sent a short survey to your email. Please let us know how we did in handling your refund request.
